content:
Set Up Primary Article and Translation Side-By-Side View

Available in: Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience.

Salesforce Knowledge is available in the Unlimited Edition with Service Cloud. It's also available for an additional cost in Essentials, Professional, Enterprise, Performance, and Developer Editions.

To set up:

* Manage Salesforce Knowledge AND Manage Articles
* To view articles: Allow View Knowledge

From Setup, select Object Manager tab. Select Knowledge object. Click Edit in Lightning App Builder. Create a Translations tab and name it "Translations". Drag Translation Primary Article component onto the new page. Set visibility filters as needed. Save and activate the page.
title: Setting Up Primary Article and Translation Side-By-Side View
